jd: Hello Vendors, I hope this email finds you well. We are currently seeking a Full Stack Developer for an exciting opportunity in Pleasanton, CA. Please review the job details below and let us know if you are interested. Job Title: Full Stack Developer Location: Pleasanton, CA - Onsite Role 3 day. We are looking for USC for this candidates. Skills: AEM, Java, Javascript, Angular, React, HTML, Spring, Node.js, MySQL, MongoDB, GitHub, Docker, Identify & Access Management (IAM). Description: • 7+ years building modern web applications/sites in a professional environment • 7+ years experiences in designing, developing, integrating and deploying web services (with REST/SOAP/JSON/XML) using micro services architecture • Experience with Java and web services testing tools (Junit, SOAPUI, Postman, JMeter, etc.) • Familiarity with server-side programming (e.g. Node.js, Spring Boot) Strong experience working across multiple products in Adobe Experience Cloud – primarily Adobe Experience Manager and Adobe Analytics • Experience in end to end implementations of AEM 6.3 or later • Minimum of 5 years with JavaScript and proficient in at least one modern JavaScript framework (Angular preferred) - including the ability to work with remote APIs and third-party web services, loading data asynchronously, understanding state management, using JavaScript templates and dynamic views.
